main.name: Hamza Ahmad
main.bio: I am an enthusiastic youth seeking work experience in an organization that will provide me with the opportunity for professional growth and enhancement of my abilities. I am a driven, hardworking, and dedicated individual who will prove to be an asset for my employer. I have the confidence in my ability to work independently as well as a team member.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to email me or message me

education.description: I am currently enrolled in Thompson River University to study computer science and specialize in AI/Cyber Security

work.title: Phone Technician
work.description: I was a cell phone repair techinician and troubleshooter. My job was to diagnose phones and repair phones.

work.description: My job was to restock shelves overnight
